name: JamJestSimon's Sudoku
description:
Early build of a sudoku-game

Has three levels of difficulty

Features include:

- Randomly generated puzzles (Infinite replayability)

- A solution timer

- Interactable grid (because of course it is)

- A win state (WOW)

- Works on PC and Mobile Devices

- Your best time is saved even in the browser version (You have to enable third-party cookies for this to work though)

The Web version does not work on all browsers

Introducing PENCIL MODE

You can mark what numbers can go on a tile and the markings disappear whenever you decide on a number on that tile, or they are excluded by placing corresponding number in the column, row or square.

Now also including SHORTCUTS

No more are the days of tedious mouse clicks, now you can select the number you're placing with number keys (0 for Clear) and toggle PENCIL MODE with Space
